sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { createApiDoc, defaultApiDoc } from '../index.js' const attribute = (dark, attr) => createApiDoc( dark, attr, 'String', '', `The ${attr} attribute for the img element.` ) const variant = (dark, type) => createApiDoc( dark, type, 'Boolean', 'false', `Renders ${type} variant of avatar.` ) export const avatarApi = (dark) => { return [ ...defaultApiDoc(dark, true), attribute(dark, 'alt'), attribute(dark, 'src'), createApiDoc( dark, 'size', `'small' | 'medium' | 'large' | Number`, 'medium', 'The css color of the avatar.' ), createApiDoc( dark, 'color', 'String', --white, 'The css color of the avatar.' ), createApiDoc( dark, 'bgColor', 'String', --primary, 'The css background color of the avatar.' ), variant(dark, 'square'), variant(dark, 'rounded') ] }
